mapper.select: SELECT s.order_no, s.order_dt, s.parrd_dt, d.pro_cd, d.pro_nm FROM order_sheet s JOIN order_detail d ON s.order_no = d.order_no WHERE d.plan_status is null OR d.plan_status='미등록'

SELECT 'PL'|| TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{planDtFormat},'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyMMdd')|| CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(*)+1,'fm000') ELSE '001' END plan_cd FROM plans_header WHERE TO_CHAR(plan_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{planDtFormat}
